about_the_game: What would you do if you found yourself trapped on an eerie space station with nothing but a computer? Play as the hacker Alex and help your partner Sam uncover the horrible truth of the facility. It doesn't take long until you have to ask yourself who Alex really is and if your reality is what it seems to be. Gather information, navigate, talk and hack your way through this prologue of this atmospheric, fully voiced hacking adventure.
